title: Post something(s) about you GD would otherwise never know.
body:
I'll start.

- As much as I come across as a nice person to most on Boards, I'm actually sometimes extremely toxic in-game.
- I'm a really, really huge fan of The Simpsons.
- Though I have a reputation for upscale attitude and business, my best friends include a bearded factory drudge worker, a balding 22-year old unemployable twit, and a socially depreciated ginger. 

Your turn.
